price: 8 voilà ceux qui, pour prix de leurs œuvres, n’auront d’autre refuge que le feu de l’Enfer.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
